page.title: 03CLUBS IN SHIPSTON
page.content: The following are{community groups}to be found in Shipston-on-Stour. Women's Institute,Stour Valley Lions, Stour Singers,National Housewives' Register,Town Band,Dramatic Society, Local History Society,Sports Clubs, Political Associations,Junior and High School Parent-Teacher Associations, National Farmers' Union,Young Farmers' Club,British Legion,Council for the Disabled,Twinning Association,Writers' Circle,Age Concern,Adult Classes and Church Groups.The most popular with people interviewed were Sports Clubs and Adult Classes. { Children}can join Cubs,Scouts,Guides, Brownies,Beavers,Junior Band,Out of School Club,Play Scheme,Youth Club, Sports and Church Clubs. The most popular is the holiday Play Scheme.
